documents.document: I'm having an internal freak out on the bus over these qotsa teasers. SO HAPPY

Oh lord I really want Fed to win. I'm getting nervy and shouty at the telly like I get with Novak
This is just stunning from Federer. I hope he keeps it up because Rafa won't just lie down and give up #AusOpen
Being on holidays from school and watching every minute of Wimbledon and the US Open - those were the days
It's just rare that I actually get a chance to watch a whole match
